ProductInfo.Features:
FREE 19" Wide Screen LED Monitor Included In The Package.
6 Cameras: 1/3" SONY CCD, 700 TV lines, Vari-Focal 4~9mm manual lens. WDR(Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu. Low Illumination 0 Lux (with IR LED on). Water proof
8 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with 2TB HDD: Supports HDMI & VGA Outputs. 960×480 & 30FPS Real Time Recording. 2 USB Ports for Data Backup & Mouse Operation.
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control.
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support.
ProductInfo.Name: GW High End CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, FREE LED Monitor, 8 Channel 2TB HDD 960H & D1 Real Time Recording, 6 Sony CCD Cameras 700 TVL VariFocal Lens, iPhone Android Viewable
